A Kiss for Courage.englishDescription: Increase velocity enthusiastically when positioned toward the front in the second half of the race after recovering endurance with a skill.

I Never Goof Up!.englishDescription: Aim for the front with unwavering determination when passing another runner from midpack or further back on a corner late-race.

Schwarzes Schwert.englishDescription: Increase velocity in a dash for the lead after running calmly and according to plan up until the final straight.

Bountiful Harvest.englishDescription: Increase velocity with a surge of great fortune when pressured by another runner toward the back in the second half of the race.

YUMMY☆SPEED!.englishDescription: Kick forward hard with renewed vigor when starting to get tired while well-positioned halfway through the race.

OMG! (ﾟ∀ﾟ) The Final Sprint! ☆.englishDescription: Increase velocity and navigation with the pure euphoria of being within breathing distance of precious waifus after passing another runner 2 times late-race.

Give Mummy a Hug ♡.englishDescription: Increase ability to break out of the pack when well-positioned and close to the runner ahead on the final straight.

A Princess Must Seize Victory!.englishDescription: Increase velocity with pretty princess power when engaged in a challenge on the final straight.

Chasing After You.englishDescription: Chase after an unseen friend when in midpack in the second half of the race, moderately increasing velocity steadily and very slightly intimidating runners ahead.

Arrows Whistle, Shadows Disperse.englishDescription: Increase velocity with a blazing spirit when pressured by another runner in the front part of the pack on the final corner or later.

Dancing in the Leaves.englishDescription: Increase ability to break out of the pack when engaged in a challenge in midpack on the final corner.

Pop & Polish.englishDescription: Get hyped and increase velocity when pressured by or passing another runner while well-positioned on the final straight.

Festive Miracle.englishDescription: Control breathing and kick forward hard toward victory in the second half of the race after recovering endurance with skills at least 3 times.

Presents from X.englishDescription: Increase velocity by deriving a path to victory mid-race after staying well-positioned from the start of the race up until the second half.

Fairy Tale.englishDescription: Increase velocity with the excitement of running when engaged in a challenge while well-positioned in the second half of the race.

White Lightning Comin' Through!.englishDescription: Bolt down the track like lightning when well-positioned or aiming for the front from midpack on a straight in the second half of the race.

Barcarole of Blessings.englishDescription: Increase velocity for a moderate duration when in the front part of the pack with 400m remaining. If at least 7 skills have been activated, greatly increase velocity for a moderate duration instead.

114th Time's the Charm.englishDescription: Give max effort when far from the lead on the final corner, moderately increasing velocity steadily for a duration proportional to distance from the lead.

Ambition to Surpass the Sakura.englishDescription: Increase velocity with blossoming ambition when well-positioned and close to the runner ahead with 300m or less remaining.

A Lifelong Dream, A Moment's Flight.englishName: A Lifelong Dream, A Moment's Flight
A Lifelong Dream, A Moment's Flight.englishDescription: Seize the moment when close to the runner behind on the final straight, slightly consuming endurance to greatly increase velocity for a moderate duration.

Operation Cacao.englishDescription: Take a slight breather and increase velocity when in the front part of the pack and detecting another runner coming from behind on a corner mid-race.

Guten Appetit ♪.englishDescription: Increase velocity continuously with a patissiere's pride on the final straight after passing another runner 3 times on the final corner or later.

Shooting Star of Dioskouroi.englishDescription: Increase velocity with guidance from the stars when far from the lead on the final straight. If positioned around the very back, greatly increase velocity instead.

Victory Cheer!.englishDescription: Moderately increase velocity when positioned toward the front on the third corner in the second half of the race. Or, kick forward hard when toward the front on the backstretch late-race.

Eternal Encompassing Shine.englishDescription: If well-positioned at the start of the final straight, her strong willpower to win increases velocity. If positioned near the front, greatly increase velocity instead.

Lovely Spring Breeze.englishDescription: From the midpack in the second half of the race, slightly increase velocity steadily for a duration based on remaining endurance.

Ravissant.englishDescription: When passing another racer at the front part of the pack on the final corner or later, perform a dazzling display that greatly increases velocity for a moderate duration.

Break It Down!.englishDescription: If positioned toward the front on a straight late-race, increase velocity with high spirits. If the straight is on the backstretch, also increase acceleration very slightly.

Peerless Dance of Flowering Flames.englishDescription: If the skill user passes another runner on the final corner or later, increase velocity with fiery fighting spirit when in the front part of the pack with 300m remaining.

Go☆Go☆Goal!.englishDescription: If the skill user passes another runner on the final corner or later, increase velocity from the midpack onward on the final straight. If the skill user isn't one of the top favorites, muster resolve to keep steadily increasing velocity.

All Charged! It's Go Time!.englishDescription: Moderately increase velocity when positioned toward the front with about 300m remaining. If coming out of an uphill, greatly increase velocity instead.

Best Day Ever.englishDescription: If well-positioned late-race on the final corner or later, increase velocity. If there's a large distance left to the finish, also increase acceleration very slightly with perfect form.

One True Color.englishDescription: If positioned toward the front with 350m remaining and there is another Umamusume close behind, the determination to stay ahead makes it easier to break out of the pack.

Now We're Cruisin'!.englishDescription: When competing for the lead if positioned in the midpack or further for the first half of the race, show off some Edo spirit and greatly increase velocity.

Victory belongs to me—Strelitzia! ☆.englishDescription: If positioned toward the back until the start of the final corner, when there are 300m remaining, cast a magic spell to increase velocity continuously.

Joyful Voyage!.englishDescription: If positioned toward the front with 200m remaining, increase velocity. Then, if also positioned near the leading Umamusume, gather strength to move slightly forward.

Wherever This Wonder Leads.englishDescription: If positioned midpack on a downhill just before late-race and there's a large distance left to the finish, enjoy the race to the fullest, increasing velocity.

trigger:BEAT.englishDescription: When near the inner rail midpack on the final corner or later, calculate the path to victory, increasing velocity and ability to navigate smoothly on the final straight.

Dreams Donned with Pride!.englishDescription: If the skill user activates another skill on the final corner late-race, take the crowd's cheers to heart and moderately increase velocity. If racing at Nakayama Racecourse, greatly increase velocity instead.

Ruler of Japan.englishDescription: I'll tackle this with everything I've got!

Corner Adept ×.englishDescription: Moderately decrease velocity on a corner with clumsy turning.

Defeatist.englishDescription: Moderately increase urge to give up when positioned around the very back on the final straight.

Reckless.englishDescription: Moderately increase carelessness when in the lead with around 200m remaining.

Blatant Fear.englishDescription: Greatly decrease velocity on a corner in the second half of the race due to Trainer's obvious anxiety.

Corner Acceleration ○.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration on a corner with masterful turning.

Straightaway Acceleration.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight.

Nimble Navigator.englishDescription: Slightly increase maneuverability when the way ahead is blocked in the last spurt.

Early Lead.englishDescription: Slightly increase ability to go to the front early-race. (Front Runner)

Final Push.englishDescription: Slightly increase ability to keep the lead on the final corner. (Front Runner)

Straightaway Spurt.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight in the last spurt. (End Closer)

Sprinting Gear.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight. (Sprint)

Updrafters.englishDescription: Slightly increase passing ability when positioned toward the back late-race. (Mile)

Countermeasure.englishDescription: Slightly increase passing ability when positioned toward the front upon approaching late-race. (Sprint)

Acceleration.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration when passing another runner mid-race. (Mile)

Second Wind.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration when not in the lead mid-race. (Front Runner)

Shrewd Step.englishDescription: Slightly increase ability to navigate smoothly. (Pace Chaser)

Straight Descent.englishDescription: Slightly improve running on a downhill. (Pace Chaser)

Tactical Tweak.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Pace Chaser)

Fighter.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration for a medium duration when trying to pass another runner. (Late Surger)

Highlander.englishDescription: Slightly improve running on an uphill.

Groundwork.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration after activating many skills early-race.

Head-On.englishDescription: Slightly increase acceleration when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)

Take the Chance.englishDescription: If positioned toward the back late-race, slightly increase acceleration. (Medium)

Corner Connoisseur.englishDescription: Increase acceleration on a corner with masterful turning.

No Stopping Me!.englishDescription: Increase maneuverability when the way ahead is blocked in the last spurt.

Taking the Lead.englishDescription: Increase ability to go to the front early-race. (Front Runner)

Unrestrained.englishDescription: Increase ability to keep the lead on the final corner. (Front Runner)

Encroaching Shadow.englishDescription: Increase acceleration on a straight in the last spurt. (End Closer)

Furious Feat.englishDescription: Increase passing ability when positioned toward the back late-race. (Mile)

Plan X.englishDescription: Increase passing ability when positioned toward the front upon approaching late-race. (Sprint)

Step on the Gas!.englishDescription: Increase acceleration when passing another runner mid-race. (Mile)

Reignition.englishDescription: Increase acceleration when not in the lead mid-race. (Front Runner)

Technician.englishDescription: Moderately increase ability to navigate smoothly. (Pace Chaser)

Determined Descent.englishDescription: Moderately improve running on a downhill. (Pace Chaser)

Shatterproof.englishDescription: Moderately increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Pace Chaser)

Hard Worker.englishDescription: Moderately increase acceleration for a medium duration when trying to pass another runner. (Late Surger)

From the Brink.englishDescription: If positioned toward the back late-race, increase acceleration. (Medium)

Neck and Neck.englishDescription: Increase acceleration when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)

Feel the Burn!.englishDescription: Moderately increase acceleration in an attempt to move up on a corner late-race.

Red Shift/LP1211-M.englishDescription: Increase acceleration by shifting gears when positioned toward the front on the final corner or later.

Shooting for Victory!.englishDescription: Increase acceleration with a pow, a wow, and a bang when well-positioned upon approaching the final straight.

Let's Pump Some Iron!.englishDescription: Increase acceleration in an attempt to move up on a corner late-race.

Angling and Scheming.englishDescription: Increase acceleration at an opportune moment when in the lead on a corner late-race.

Condor's Fury.englishDescription: Increase acceleration with blazing passion when aiming for the front from midpack on the final corner.

Moving Past, and Beyond.englishDescription: Having run the race calmly, increase acceleration with hardened determination when making a move mid-race, or on a crucial corner late-race whilst in midpack.

Budding Blossom.englishDescription: If the skill user engaged in a challenge on a mid-race corner, increase acceleration when well-positioned late-race at least halfway through the final corner.

Louder! Tracen Cheer!.englishDescription: If the skill user stays toward the very back during the first half of the race without being rushed, unleash fighting spirit to increase acceleration on the final straight.

Corner Acceleration ×.englishDescription: Moderately decrease acceleration on a corner with awkward turning.

Meticulous Measures.englishDescription: Moderately prepare to make for the finish line for a medium duration mid-race. (Sprint)

Thunderbolt Step.englishDescription: Moderately avoid becoming surrounded for a medium duration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Medium)

Dodging Danger.englishDescription: Moderately avoid becoming surrounded early-race. (Front Runner)

Forward, March!.englishDescription: Moderately prepare to aim for the front late-race. (Dirt)

Perfect Prep!.englishDescription: Prepare to make for the finish line for a medium duration mid-race. (Sprint)

Lightning Step.englishDescription: Avoid becoming surrounded for a medium duration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Medium)

Lead the Charge!.englishDescription: Prepare to aim for the front late-race. (Dirt)

Focus.englishDescription: Slightly decrease time lost to slow starts.

Concentration.englishDescription: Decrease time lost to slow starts.

Gatekept.englishDescription: Moderately increase time lost to slow starts.

Feelin' a Bit Silly.englishDescription: Greatly decrease the racer's proficiency in starting races. Effects include slow starts and reduced starting acceleration. Removed at the end of the Career playthrough.

You're Not the Boss of Me!.englishName: You're Not the Boss of Me!
You're Not the Boss of Me!.englishDescription: Increase time lost to slow starts and moderately decrease Wit.

Hawkeye.englishDescription: Moderately widen field of view with heightened observation early-race. (Medium)

Studious.englishDescription: Slightly widen field of view with heightened observation mid-race. (Late Surger)

I Can See Right Through You.englishName: I Can See Right Through You
I Can See Right Through You.englishDescription: Slightly widen field of view with situational awareness when moving sideways. (End Closer)

Strategist.englishDescription: Slightly widen field of view when positioned toward the back late-race. (End Closer)

Clairvoyance.englishDescription: Widen field of view with heightened observation early-race. (Medium)

The Bigger Picture.englishDescription: Widen field of view with heightened observation mid-race. (Late Surger)

The Coast Is Clear!.englishDescription: Moderately widen field of view with situational awareness when moving sideways. (End Closer)

Crusader.englishDescription: Widen field of view when positioned toward the back late-race. (End Closer)

Ignited Spirit SPD.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.

Ignited Spirit GUTS.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, very slightly increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.

Burning Spirit SPD.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.

Burning Spirit GUTS.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.

Ignited Spirit STA.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.

Burning Spirit STA.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.

Ignited Spirit PWR.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.

Burning Spirit PWR.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.

Ignited Spirit WIT.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing strategic navigation for a medium duration in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.

Burning Spirit WIT.englishDescription: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing strategic navigation for a medium duration in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.

Glittering Star.englishDescription: Very slightly control breathing and kick forward in the second half of the race. Effect is increased in proportion to number of career wins.

Radiant Star.englishDescription: Control breathing and kick forward in the second half of the race. Effect is increased in proportion to number of career wins.

Hesitant Front Runners.englishDescription: Slightly decrease velocity of front runners late-race.

Hesitant Pace Chasers.englishDescription: Slightly decrease velocity of pace chasers late-race.

Hesitant Late Surgers.englishDescription: Slightly decrease velocity of late surgers late-race.

Hesitant End Closers.englishDescription: Slightly decrease velocity of end closers late-race.

Intimidate.englishDescription: Moderately intimidate runners behind when positioned toward the front early-race. (Sprint)

Speed Eater.englishDescription: Slightly steal velocity from runners behind when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Mile)

Tether.englishDescription: Slightly decrease velocity of runners ahead when positioned toward the back late-race. (Medium)

Intense Gaze.englishDescription: Slightly unnerve runners in focus late-race. (End Closer)

Greed for Speed.englishDescription: Moderately steal velocity from runners behind when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Mile)

Dominator.englishDescription: Decrease velocity of runners ahead when positioned toward the back late-race. (Medium)

Petrifying Gaze.englishDescription: Unnerve runners in focus late-race. (End Closer)

Adored by All.englishDescription: Intimidate runners behind when positioned toward the front early-race. (Sprint)

Opening Gambit.englishDescription: Slightly dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Mile)

Restart.englishDescription: Slightly dull movement for runners ahead when not in the lead early-race. (Front Runner)

Battle Formation.englishDescription: Dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Mile)

Frenzied Front Runners.englishDescription: Increase time needed for front runners to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied Pace Chasers.englishDescription: Increase time needed for pace chasers to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied Late Surgers.englishDescription: Increase time needed for late surgers to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied End Closers.englishDescription: Increase time needed for end closers to calm down when they become rushed.

Trick (Front).englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for rushed runners behind when positioned toward the front mid-race.

Trick (Rear).englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for rushed runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race.

Subdued Front Runners.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for front runners early-race.

Flustered Front Runners.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for front runners mid-race.

Subdued Pace Chasers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for pace chasers early-race.

Flustered Pace Chasers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for pace chasers mid-race.

Subdued Late Surgers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for late surgers early-race.

Flustered Late Surgers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for late surgers mid-race.

Subdued End Closers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for end closers early-race.

Flustered End Closers.englishDescription: Slightly increase fatigue for end closers mid-race.

Stop Right There!.englishDescription: Slightly cause panic in and very slightly dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Sprint)

Murmur.englishDescription: Slightly disturb runners directly ahead mid-race. (Medium)

Stamina Eater.englishDescription: Very slightly steal endurance from runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Long)

Sharp Gaze.englishDescription: Slightly startle other runners late-race. (Late Surger)

You've Got No Shot.englishDescription: Cause panic in and moderately dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Sprint)

Stamina Siphon.englishDescription: Slightly steal endurance from runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Long)

Tantalizing Trick.englishDescription: Increase fatigue for rushed runners behind when positioned toward the front mid-race.

Smoke Screen.englishDescription: Moderately narrow the field of view for runners ahead late-race. (Long)

Disorient.englishDescription: Slightly narrow the field of view for runners behind when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)

Illusionist.englishDescription: Narrow the field of view for runners ahead late-race. (Long)

Dazzling Disorientation.englishDescription: Moderately narrow the field of view for runners behind when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)

Runaway.englishDescription: Attempt to gain an especially large lead and keep it until the finish. (Front Runner)

Carnival Bonus.englishDescription: Gain +{0}% Carnival Points. This skill will disappear when the event ends.

Best in Japan.englishDescription: Everyone's expectations strongly inspire the skill user, increasing velocity on the final corner. (Long)
